name: Avoid Artifacts with too many parameters (Javascript)
description: Avoid artifacts with more than X parameters. The threshold X is a parameter and it can be changed at will.
output:
Line and column for each violation 
Associated value => number of violations found
rationale: For maintainability and readability reasons, artifacts should not have too many parameters.
total: Number of Javascript functions and methods

technicalCriteria.name: Complexity - Algorithmic and Control Structure Complexity
